thread.title: BRIEF-Sonoma Pharma Receives Four New Uae Regulatory Approvals That Include Acne And Anti-Fungal Products

title: BRIEF-Sonoma Pharma Receives Four New Uae Regulatory Approvals That Include Acne And Anti-Fungal Products

organizations.name: brief-sonoma pharma receives four new uae

text:
April 17, 2018 / 11:08 AM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Sonoma Pharma Receives Four New Uae Regulatory Approvals That Include Acne And Anti-Fungal Products Reuters Staff 
April 17 (Reuters) - Sonoma Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* SONOMA PHARMACEUTICALS RECEIVES FOUR NEW UAE REGULATORY APPROVALS THAT INCLUDE ACNE AND ANTI-FUNGAL PRODUCTS 
* SONOMA PHARMACEUTICALS - 4 APPROVALS ENCOMPASS HYPOCHLOROUS ACID-BASED PRODUCTS FOR TREATMENT OF ACNE AS WELL AS ANTI-FUNGAL INDICATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
